summary: This bill, the Air Guard Standardizing Tuition Assistance To Unify the Services Act of 2025 (or Air Guard STATUS Act of 2025), mandates the Secretary of the Air Force to create a permanent program providing tuition assistance to members of the Air National Guard. The program will cover all or a portion of educational expenses as outlined in section 2007 of title 10, United States Code, for eligible members adhering to training regulations.
